metadata.title: CVE-2022-48560 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free exists in Python through 3.9 via heappushpop in heapq.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48560` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python2.7 - 2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5
libpython2.7 - 2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5
libpython2.7-minimal - 2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5
libpython2.7-stdlib - 2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5
libpython2.7-testsuite - 2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5
python2.7 - 2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5
python2.7-examples - 2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5
python2.7-minimal - 2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.18-13ubuntu1.5').
